titleStmt.title: Here begynneth the orcharde of Syon in the whiche is conteyned the reuelacyons of seynt [sic] Katheryne of Sene, with ghostly fruytes [and] precyous plantes for the helthe of mannes soule.
Vita di S. Catarina da Siena. English
titleStmt.author: Raymond, of Capua, 1330-1399.
James, Dane.

publicationStmt.publisher: In flete strete, at the sygne of the sonne, by me Wynkyn de Worde,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of oure lorde. M.CCCCC. [and] xix, and the. xxviii. daye of Septe[m]ber. [1519]]

notesStmt.note: A translation of an Italian translation of Ambrosianus Catherinus of a Latin version of: Raymond of Capua. Vita di S. Catarina da Siena.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
